channel.title: Icons :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Adding Icons One of the best ways to make a web user interface very accessible and easy to use is by using globally recognized icons to represent certain actions, such as logging in, returning to the homepage, and editing items. Thankfully, there is an easy to use icon package that works directly with PrimeVue called PrimeIcons that we can use in our project. So, letâ€™s quickly install that icon pack and see how we can use it in our application.
